name: The Few Who Stand
description:
The people of Freed need you. 
The Partacan worms are invading and will not stop until every last person is devoured.
You are the last line of defense for the city. You must not let these filthy vermin pass. 
Defend the city. Keep it alive.

Controls:

W and S to move

Left mouse button to shoot

Scrollwheel or 1 and 2 to move

Escape to quit

Music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
